headline: Bringing Advanced Vascular Diagnostics to the Western US with the SmartVascular Dx™ Test
summary: IRVINE, Calif., Aug. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MorningStar Laboratories, LLC., (“MSL” or “the Company”), a leading developer of precision diagnostic tests addressing unmet clinical needs, is excited to announce that its SmartVascular Dx™ (SVDx) test, formerly known as the PULS™ Cardiac Test, is now available in the Western United States. This innovative diagnostic tool aims to enhance vascular health monitoring in the region. We are pleased to share that the SmartVascular Dx test has been inc
